revised_title: Ultrastructural Analysis of Oogonia and Oocytes Development in Fetal and Neonatal Rats
tldr: The study examines the ultrastructure of oogonia and oocytes in fetal and neonatal rats using electron microscopy. It identifies the different developmental stages and patterns of degeneration, providing insights into the process of oogenesis and meiosis in female reproductive systems.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
